DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine individually tailor Internet intervention efficacious individually tailor print-based intervention standard Internet intervention physical activity adoption maintenance among sedentary adult .
DOC.detailed_description: As many 75 % Americans engage regular physical activity 25 % completely inactive . The risk cardiovascular disease almost double among people physically inactive , comparable risk associate increase systolic blood pressure , cigarette smoking , elevate serum cholesterol . To make impact physical activity prevalence population level , research must focus interface clinical efficacy trial large-scale dissemination study . Studies interface must compare proven intervention new innovation potential reach large number sedentary Americans . The objective study determine differential effect intervention delivery channel ( Tailored Internet versus Tailored Print ) physical activity adoption maintenance previously sedentary adult . To knowledge , study examine efficacy Tailored Internet-based physical activity intervention . Thus , conduct randomize controlled clinical trial compare three group , 1 ) Internet-based motivationally-tailored individualize feedback ( Tailored Internet ) ; 2 ) print-based motivationally-tailored individualized feedback previously show efficacious ( Tailored Print ) ; 3 ) website currently available public ( Standard Internet comparison group ) . Two hundred forty healthy , sedentary woman men age 18-65 randomly assign one three group . The Tailored Internet Tailored Print arm match frequency content contact . Data collect baseline , 6 , 12 month use well-established physical activity physical performance measure , well comprehensive set psychosocial questionnaire . Our primary hypothesis individual randomize Tailored Internet arm exhibit significantly high level physical activity participation 6 12 month individual Tailored Print arm due enhance capability Internet ( e.g. , immediacy feedback enhance graphic ) . And , addition , subject randomize Tailored Internet Tailored Print condition exhibit significantly high level physical activity participation 6 12 month Standard Internet comparison condition . Other question interest include examination potential moderator mediator intervention-physical activity relationship . This study contribute important information regard relative efficacy Internet print-based intervention , utilized widespread public health dissemination .
